column2: ENGLISH

Being male, unmarried and almost handsome in a court filled with young women who all seek your attention is not half bad. A particularly young wench, almost irresistible, desires the pleasure of my company...
My unwed daughter has been... indiscreet. She has been hiding her pregnancy from me and now presents me with her child.

There are several ways to deal with this unfortunate situation,' Spymaster [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] told me when I asked [Root.job_spymaster.GetHerHim] for advice on how to deal with my daughter's bastard child...

My liege [From.GetTitledFirstName] came to me, dragging [From.GetHerHis] daughter with [From.GetHerHim] with a newborn child in her arms.\n'I trust you to deal with my daughter's bastard child discreetly', [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me coldly and left [From.GetHerHis] daughter and her bastard child with me.
I trusted Spymaster [From.GetTitledFirstName] to deal with my daughter and her bastard child in a discreet manner but [From.GetSheHe] failed miserably!
Despite my clear instructions on how to deal with my daughter and her bastard child, Spymaster [From.GetTitledFirstName] let them live!
'A bastard can cause a lot of trouble', insisted [Root.GetSpymasterName] [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] and advised me of a possible opportunity to get rid of the bastard in the court.
A bastard son of mine petitioned me to recognize him as a legitimate heir.
Am I not all that any child could be? I should ask my father to be included in the succession!
My illegitimate [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] asked me to acknowledge [From.GetHerHim] as my [GetFromRelation] and thus include [From.GetHerHim] in the succession.
I waited silently and patiently for my father [From.GetTitledFirstName] to answer my request to acknowledge me and include me in the succession. Finally, [From.GetTitledFirstName] answered...
Raising a child on your own is hard, but raising a bastard child is even harder. We are an embarrassment to our family and very few of them are willing to help us.

The embarrassment and black stain on our dynasty that is my daughter [From.GetTitledFirstName] and her bastard child asked me today to help her. I refuse to do this, blaming  the embarrassment that has been brought upon the family on...
[From.GetTitledFirstName] blames me for the difficult situation [From.GetHerHis] daughter is in, what with me being the father of her bastard child...
[From.GetTitledFirstName] blames me for the hopeless situation [From.GetHerHis] daughter is in, what with my son being the father of her bastard child...
A dream is born and a sword sharpened...
The other children at court tease me relentlessly because I don't have a real father. I'm a bastard and they know it!
People keep telling me I am a bastard but no one explains what it is! Maybe [Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName] knows?
[From.GetTitledFirstName] asked me while looking seriously at me with [From.GetHerHis] big, innocent eyes what being a 'bastard' actually means.
Surely one night's passion won't tarnish my soul?
Pay heavily to deal with it quietly
Keep her hidden, then dispose of the child'
This is just part of my job
Accuse Spymaster [From.GetTitledFirstName] of treason and imprison [From.GetHerHim]
As long as I don't get involved, again...
Go ahead, see if your plan works
Not a chance
I'll ask him right now
Unthinkable!
...that it was unthinkable!
My father might be able to help us
...my daughter [From.GetTitledFirstName]
I am guilty
I will take care of it
The seed is planted
Fight them back!
What does 'bastard' means?
You are an abomination in the eyes of God
I won't soil my soul with a night of passion!
The child is of my blood and I will take care of both of them
Slay the father and take the child away'
What an interesting opportunity...
I confess my part of this blunder
I doubt the bastard child will cause any trouble
I'm not sure you're worthy
Why bother?
I agree. You are a worthy heir
...that [From.GetSheHe] agreed and would legitimise me as [From.GetHerHis] child
I keep quiet and toil hard
...my daughter's bastard child
That has nothing to do with me!
That has nothing to do with me, or my son!
Hide from them
You will not inherit anything
Punish her harshly and give away the child!
I don't want to know, just deal with it...
I pardon everyone
I welcome you with open arms!
...the father of my daughter's bastard child
Try to become friendly with them
You will make your own way in the world!
Try to do bad things to them when they can't notice it's you
Your father sinned when he fathered you
Spymaster [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] advises you on how to deal with your daughter's bastard child
Spymaster [This.GetTitledFirstName] takes care of the situation with your daughter's bastard child
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] failed to cover up [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s daughter's unwanted pregnancy.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] saved [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s daughter and her bastard child
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] asks [Root.GetHerHis] father [This.GetTitledFirstName] to legitimise [Root.GetHerHim]
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s asks her father [This.GetTitledFirstName] to help her
The father, [This.GetTitledFirstName], is blamed
The Grandfather, [This.GetTitledFirstName], is blamed for not raising his son properly
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] asks [Root.GetHerHis] guardian [This.GetTitledFirstName] what being a bastard means
